MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow,affecting properties in MacDuff Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.39am. Our engineers have arrived on site at McBeth Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.40am on  Tuesday 29th December 2020
